/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall and proud, their windows reflecting the bright sunlight. The street below is a hive of activity with cars and buses moving along it, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm glow. The image is a beautiful blend of urban architecture and natural light, showcasing the vibrant city life in Beijing.
